mcqs.question: How do you write a comment in CSS?
mcqs.explanation: CSS comments use the `/* comment */` syntax.

mcqs.question: Which of the following is true about CSS comments?
options: They are required for each rule
They must be placed at the top
mcqs.explanation: Comments are ignored by browsers and do not affect rendering.

mcqs.question: Where can you place CSS comments?
options: Only at the start of the file
Only at the end of the file
mcqs.explanation: CSS comments can be placed anywhere in the stylesheet.

mcqs.question: Which of these will cause an error in CSS?
mcqs.explanation: Only the `/* ... */` syntax is valid. `//` and `#` are invalid.

mcqs.question: What is the main purpose of writing comments in CSS?
mcqs.explanation: Comments are used to explain code to developers, not for styling.

mcqs.question: Can you use comments to disable a CSS declaration temporarily?
options: Yes, by wrapping the code in `/* ... */`
Only at the top of the file
mcqs.explanation: You can comment out any part of CSS to disable it temporarily.

mcqs.question: Which of the following is a valid multi-line comment in CSS?
Do CSS comments appear in the rendered web page?
mcqs.explanation: CSS comments are not rendered or visible to users.

mcqs.question: Which is a correct example of a CSS comment?
mcqs.explanation: Only `/* ... */` is a valid comment in CSS.

mcqs.question: What happens if you forget to close a CSS comment?
options: The browser ignores only that comment
All CSS after the comment is ignored
An error is shown to the user
mcqs.explanation: A missing closing tag causes the browser to treat the rest of the file as a comment.

mcqs.question: Can you nest comments in CSS?
options: No, nested comments are not allowed
Yes, but only in external files
mcqs.explanation: CSS does not support nested comments.
The comment is ignored and `<h1>` will be blue.

mcqs.question: What is the best practice when writing CSS comments?
mcqs.explanation: Comments should be used to explain complex or important code.

mcqs.question: Are comments retained in CSS files after minification?
options: Only if they are single-line comments
Only if they are multi-line comments
mcqs.explanation: Most minifiers remove comments to reduce file size.

mcqs.question: Which of the following is NOT a use of CSS comments?
mcqs.explanation: Comments do not style elements; they are only for documentation.
